Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

DCIMPower.description: This is the schema definition for the DCIM Power Zone Metrics.
DCIMPower.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent a DCIM Power Zone metrics resource for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

DCIMPowerType.description: The actual DCIM Power Type of DCIMPower.
DCIMPowerType.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual DCIM Power Type of DCIMPower.

Generator.description: This is the definition for a Generator collection.
Generator.longDescription: These properties shall be the definition for a Generator collection for a Redfish implementation.

Links.description: Contains references to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: The Links property, as described by the Redfish Specification, shall contain references to resources that are related to, but not contained by (subordinate to), this resource.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

PDU.description: This is the definition for a PDU collection.
PDU.longDescription: These properties shall be the definition for a PDU collection for a Redfish implementation.

RackPDU.description: This is the definition for a RackPDU collection.
RackPDU.longDescription: These properties shall be the definition for a RackPDU collection for a Redfish implementation.

Rectifier.description: This is the definition for a Rectifier collection.
Rectifier.longDescription: These properties shall be the definition for a Rectifier collection for a Redfish implementation.

Switchgear.description: This is the definition for a Switchgear collection.
Switchgear.longDescription: These properties shall be the definition for a Switchgear collection for a Redfish implementation.

TransferSwitch.description: This is the definition for a TransferSwitch collection.
TransferSwitch.longDescription: These properties shall be the definition for a TransferSwitch collection for a Redfish implementation.

Transformer.description: This is the definition for a Transformer collection.
Transformer.longDescription: These properties shall be the definition for a Transformer collection for a Redfish implementation.

UPS.description: This is the definition for a UPS collection.
UPS.longDescription: These properties shall be the definition for a UPS collection for a Redfish implementation.

VFD.description: This is the definition for a VFD collection.
VFD.longDescription: These properties shall be the definition for a VFD collection for a Redfish implementation.

Links.description: Contains references to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: This type, as described by the Redfish Specification, shall contain references to resources that are related to, but not contained by (subordinate to), this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Chassis.description: An array of references to the chassis associated with this power zone.
Chassis.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a reference to the resource that this power zone is associated with and shall reference a resource of type Chassis.

ManagedBy.description: An array of references to the Managers responsible for managing this power zone.
ManagedBy.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a reference to the resource that manages this power zone and shall reference a resource of type Manager.

Oem.longDescription: This object represents the Oem property.  All values for resources described by this schema shall comply to the requirements as described in the Redfish specification.

RelatedSystems.description: An array of references to the computer systems associated with this power zone.
RelatedSystems.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a reference to the resource that this power zone is associated with and shall reference a resource of type ComputerSystem.

OemActions.description: The available OEM specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain any additional OEM actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.
